title: Anatomy of Animals
description: Here it ANATOMY OF ANIMALS! The Highly Accurate & 100% Correct in Every Way guide to the animal kingdom! Only here will you learn important facts, Do crabs do well on Tinder? Do turtles work out? And is that platypus down to watch Gilmore Girls with you? (...HE IS.) Join Silver Reuben Award-winning cartoonist Dave Kellett as he gives you an absurd, but SCIENTIFICALLY SOUND tour of what animals are really like.
author: Dave Kellett
